channel.title: Social Risks on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Social Risks on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Social Suffering and Vulnerability Mapping
item.description:
Field workflows

  • Vulnerability and needs assessments
  • Service access and infrastructure mapping
  • Community engagements and feedback

Works with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Prepare forms in QGIS and collaborate through QFieldCloud with clear permissions and history.
